description: This file defines a minimal API client for a React-based frontend application, encapsulating fetch requests, URL construction, error handling, and exporting functions to interact with a backend API specifically for music-related data.
external_files: none (depends on fetch API and environment variables)

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Retrieves the base URL for API requests, reading from environment variables with a fallback to a default.

methods.name: safeReadJson(response)
methods.description: Safely reads JSON from a Response object, returning null if parsing fails.

methods.name: buildErrorMessage({ response, json })
methods.description: Constructs a detailed error message based on a failed HTTP response and optional JSON error body.

methods.name: apiRequest(path, { method = "GET", headers, body } = {})
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request to the backend API, handling JSON and errors, and returning response data.

methods.name: getStreamUrl(songId)
methods.description: Returns the absolute streaming URL for a specific song based on its ID.

ctags.name: apiRequest
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiRequest(path, { method = "GET", headers, body } = {}) {$/
